Posts.EditableText:
This is an honestly scary horror to me, but I think most people will think of it as not very scary at all. Still, it is supposed to be scary, but also fun.
I had to download the file and play offline to see the images and hear the music, so if you have to download the game, I hope you play it, either way, unless you don't like it or something. I hope it's a good game. It was good to me.

https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/uotdg6wlyka-8-j9mo0rbq/another-hour

Posts.EditableText: I realized late the guess a number game is going to be tricky because it doesn't really quit on its own. I don't know now if it was right of me to leave people guessing, so, as I added to the game page - who will read it, I don't know - when you are tired of guessing numbers guess something else, then, press enter and scroll up. Sorry I should have said that. I know.
Posts.HTML: I realized late the guess a number game is going to be tricky because it doesn't really quit on its own. I don't know now if it was right of me to leave people guessing, so, as I added to the game page - who will read it, I don't know - when you are tired of guessing numbers guess something else, then, press enter and scroll up.
